basejump
  • Reference

log ratio to fold change

Convert log ratio normalized values to fold change. Based on the approach used in gtools::logratio2foldchange().

logRatioToFoldChange(lr, base = 2)

Arguments

lr

Numeric vector of log ratio values.
base

Logarithm base. Defaults to 2, for compatibility with RNA-Seq differential expression output.

Value

Fold change values.

Examples

logRatioToFoldChange(seq(-3, 3, 0.5))
#>  [1] -8.000000 -5.656854 -4.000000 -2.828427 -2.000000 -1.414214  1.000000
#>  [8]  1.414214  2.000000  2.828427  4.000000  5.656854  8.000000

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
